data: Our poster exploring privacy of social network users at SOUPS '16. Read the abstract.
Presented our paper CyFuzz: A differential testing framework for cyber-physical systems development environments at CyPhy 2016!
We will be showing our demo "Fuzzing Cyber-Physical Systems Development Environments with CyFuzz" in HSCC 2017
Served as Artifact Evaluation Committee Member at International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis (ISSTA) 2017
Our paper Automatically Finding Bugs in a Commercial Cyber-Physical System Development Tool Chain with SLforge has been accepted at 40th International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) 2018
Presented poster Understanding and Improving Cyber-Physical System Models and Development Tools at the Doctoral Symposium at 40th International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) 2018

Presented our paper A Curated Corpus or Simulink Models for Model-based Empirical Studies at 4th International Workshop on Software Engineering for Smart Cyber-Physical Systems (SEsCPS), co-located at 40th International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) 2018
Our SLforge poster has received third prize in the ACM Student Research Competition at 40th International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) 2018

data.title: Software Engineering (part time)
data.description: Designed and developed various e-commerce back-ends and front-ends. Recruited new developers

data.title: Senior Software Engineer
data.description: Led team. Designed and developed a non-blocking back-end for bulk messaging, which addressed the scalibility issues of the earlier product.

data.title: Software Engineer
data.description:
Fixed concurrency-issues and increased the number of concurrent clients in a multi-threaded VoIP softswitch.

Implemented new features including voice mail, call-shop and secure database backup. Developed server utilities including automated bill-generation and server health monitoring.

data.title: Engineering Intern
data.description: Developed C++ infrastructure to automatically validate the Fixed-Point Toolbox for MATLAB, using automated oracles to test various linear algebra operators for fixed-point data type.
